title: Bricks Towers for Wear
summary: Move bricks to merge them into big one
description: The Bricks Towers app is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 or 1948 tile!Move bricks to merge them into big one !The most perfect number puzzle game for Android !Also available on wear platform.
descriptionHTML:
The Bricks Towers app is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game.
Join the numbers and get to the 2048 or 1948 tile!

Move bricks to merge them into big one !

The most perfect number puzzle game for Android !
Also available on wear platform.
comments: The most addictive and smart game I just love the graphics and the enjoyment when playing this game.
